attributes.action: assign funds to recreate the conditions for a concert by The Who in the their early 1970s glory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rather than spending billions on wars in Iraq and nuclear weapons, I feel taxpayers' money would be better suited finding the means to create a time machine to bring The Who from their early 1970s live vintage back to the present, and stage the largest FREE live gig ever seen on earth.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
